name: acarshub-typescript
description: Web front end for the docker-acarshub project

scripts.buildtest-old: npm run build && mkdir -p ./dist-min && mkdir -p ./css-min && rm -f ./css-min/site.css && rm -f ./dist-min/*.js && cp dist/*.js dist-min/ && cp ./css/site.css ./css-min/site.css
scripts.buildtest: npm run build && npm run minify
scripts.buildprod: npm run build && npm run minify
scripts.minify: mkdir -p ./dist-min && mkdir -p ./css-min && rm -f ./dist-min/*.js && rm -f ./css-min/*.css && ./minifer.sh && uglifyjs-folder dist -o dist-min/index.js && uglifycss ./css/site.css --output ./css-min/site.css
scripts.installer: rm -rf ../rootfs/webapp/static/js && rm -rf ../rootfs/webapp/static/css && mkdir -p ../rootfs/webapp/static/css/other && mkdir -p ../rootfs/webapp/static/js/other && cp ./dist-min/*.js ../rootfs/webapp/static/js/ && cp ./js-other/* ../rootfs/webapp/static/js/other/ && cp ./css-min/site.css ../rootfs/webapp/static/css/site.css && cp -r ./css/other/* ../rootfs/webapp/static/css/other/

author: Fred Clausen
